arts.ttl: Inter eye German talent Rocco Reitz: The Bundesliga’s rising star
arts.sum: Inter Milan have set its sights on a new midfield prospect, Rocco Reitz, the talented 22-year-old from Borussia Mönchengladbach. The post Inter eye German talent Rocco Reitz: The Bundesliga’s rising star appeared first on FootItalia.com.

The match burst into life immediately as Tim Kleindienst headed home a cross from Franck Honorat after just 37 seconds, sending Borussia-Park into raptures. Borussia Mönchengladbach claimed a convincing 4-1 victory against Kiel at Borussia-Park, with Franck Honorat providing two assists in a stellar performance.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Holstein Kiel preview: Gladbach look to continue home run
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach aim to maintain their pursuit of European qualification as they host strugglers Holstein Kiel at Borussia Park on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
